statements: SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, can_download, can_view FROM user_permissions WHERE can_delete = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, can_view FROM user_permissions WHERE can_download = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE can_view = TRUE AND can_delete = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, can_download FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id > 3;
SELECT user_id, can_view, can_download, can_delete FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id > 100 AND can_view = true;
SELECT user_id, can_delete, can_view, can_download FROM user_permissions WHERE can_download = true;
SELECT can_view, can_delete FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id < 50 OR can_view = false;
SELECT user_id, can_view FROM user_permissions WHERE can_delete = false ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT image_name, image_url FROM image_data WHERE image_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM image_data JOIN users ON image_data.user_id = users.user_id ORDER BY image_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT user_id, username, image_name FROM users JOIN image_data ON users.user_id = image_data.user_id WHERE image_name LIKE '%beach%';
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_url FROM image_data ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT users.user_id, COUNT(image_data.image_id) AS image_count FROM users LEFT JOIN image_data ON users.user_id = image_data.user_id GROUP BY users.user_id HAVING image_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, role FROM users ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT * FROM images WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(image_id) as image_count FROM permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING image_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY role, user_id DESC;
SELECT users.username, images.image_id, images.upload_date FROM users INNER JOIN images ON users.user_id = images.user_id WHERE users.role = 'admin';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, role FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY user_id;

SELECT users.username AS user_name, images.image_id, permissions.permission_type FROM users JOIN images ON users.user_id = images.user_id LEFT JOIN permissions ON images.image_id = permissions.image_id ORDER BY images.upload_date DESC, users.username;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, can_view FROM UserPermissions WHERE can_edit = TRUE;
SELECT role_name, can_view FROM RolePermissions WHERE can_edit = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM ImageData ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM UserRoles ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, can_view FROM UserPermissions WHERE can_edit = true;
SELECT role_name FROM UserRoles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ImageData WHERE image_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM UserRoles WHERE role_name in ('Admin', 'Manager');
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM image_data JOIN users ON image_data.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.role_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
